mapper.insert: insert into q_TM (id, tm_type, tm_html, score, diff_score, create_by, create_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tmHtml,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{diffScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into q_TM
id,
tm_type,
tm_html,
score,
diff_score,
create_date,
create_by,
create_name,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tmHtml,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{diffScore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update Q_tm
tm_type = #{tmType},
tm_html = #{tmHtml},
score = #{score},
diff_score = #{diffScore},
create_by = #{createBy} ,
create_name = #{createName},
isvalid = #{isvalid},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select from q_tm where 1=1
and instr(tm_html,#{tmHtml})>0
order by create_date desc
